entry.title: Keynote: Become a Data Superhero How Data Can Change the World
entry.summary:
Description

PyData DC 2016

The capacity to gather and interpret data can be low for many nonprofits. Working together, data scientists and organizations can be a world-changing combination. Byte Back has found a way to use data analysis for good and will help you learn how to tap into your â€¦
entry.content:
Description

PyData DC 2016

The capacity to gather and interpret data can be low for many nonprofits. Working together, data scientists and organizations can be a world-changing combination. Byte Back has found a way to use data analysis for good and will help you learn how to tap into your own superpowers.
